name: Pokémon VR: Ash's Room
storyline:
''This is a fan made Project and has no ties to Nintendo or the Pokemon Company. I made this because I love the Pokemon series and wanted to make something that would pay tribute and put a smile on the face of other fans.

I designed it for the HTC Vive and that's what I also tested it on but I also went ahead and mapped the Oculus Touch key as well. Since I do not have an Oculus Touch I can't 100% guarantee that it will work as intended. I've had a few people test it out on theirs and said it was playable. '' - Jarlan Perez
summary: This is a recreation of Ash's room with Unreal 4 by Jarlan Perez.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: POKÉMON IN VIRTUAL REALITY! | Pokémon VR: Ash's Room (HTC Vive Gameplay)
